alert.note: Alert for Lower Koyukuk Valley; Lower Yukon and Innoko Valleys; Middle Yukon Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 13 at 2:30PM AKST until November 16 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 10 inches. * WHERE...Lower Koyukuk Valley, Middle Yukon Valley and Lower Yukon and Innoko Valleys. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There is a chance for a wintry mix south of Kaltag. Ice accumulations of a light glaze is possible.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Lower Koyukuk Valley; Lower Yukon and Innoko Valleys; Middle Yukon Valley
